extendedInfo.description: Here comes Tiny City â the latest town building sim for your mobile. You have just opened a shop in a tiny town with a tiny population. Local authorities turned their backs on the citizens a long time ago, so now you are the last hope! Your goal is simple: lead the town to the prosperity, turning it into true metropolis. Use your wits, plan the development and urban sprawl of your would-be metropolis â in other words, build a city of your dreams!**Runs beautifully on tablets**Tiny City features:DEEP GAMEPLAYTiny City features an exciting story with twists and turns and includes over 1000 fun and captivating quests to complete!BUILD IT UPWithore than 100 unique building types to construct you'll never be short of something new to create as you make your city rich and varied.LOOKIN GOODDelightfully colorful visual style with memorable characters and a great art style make it a joy to look at as well as play.WHAT YOU WAITING FOR?Tiny City is fun for the whole family an best of all, itâs completely free!

reviews.title: Update malfunction
reviews.comment: I just updated and now it won\'t let me play!
reviews.author: Tessa Russell

reviews.title: Bad Update
reviews.comment: Game keeps going to opening screen. Cannot play game.
reviews.author: Frederick Miller

reviews.title: Fun little game, but...
reviews.comment: UPDATED REVIEW: This game has not worked since the latest update in August 2013.  Many people have the same issue.  Avoid until they fix it right.  Original review: The game is easy to play and doesn\'t involve a lot of time.  But be forewarned that the programming has issues and the sequencing of the game sometimes leaves you with no instruction on what to do next.  For example, I need to restore the port next, but have zero propellers and there is no hint about how to get them.  Also, pick and choose wisely what you spend city money on for upgrades.  Some things are far more economical and effective than others.  And upgrading businesses greatly increases the cost to repair them when damaged, which is way too often.  I have demolished many businesses that turned out to be bad investments.  And it crashes a LOT.
reviews.author: Jim Wilson

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Lots of quests to keep you going, good job.
reviews.author: julie mcguire

reviews.title: Fraud/ALL IS GONE
reviews.comment: I\'m very skeptical about these kind of games. Regardless i enjoyed playing this game. So yesterday i decided to give this a chance so i bought real coins $19.99 to be exact. So, I\'m happy leveling, buying factories, buildings, completing quests. Reached lvl 27! I exit the game cause i had to get back to work. When i returned to the game ALL OF IT WAS GONE!!!! & I was back to lvl 15!!!! I should have just followed my instinct!!!...these kind of games all they want is to rob you!!!!!
reviews.author: Nancy Gonzalez
